talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Very strange indeed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Jermain$
10 years ago after Clara left the village, we did not hear any news from her at all. All this time, she has never came to look or visit her husband before.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So no one knows where she is…??</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Jermain$

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I think you can find some news of them at Prairie Town</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I'm will make a trip to Prairie Town.</html>

uh, anything that I can help you?

.

$Mayor Harold$
Clara was on her way here when she was badly assault by monsters. Before she died, she entrusted her daughter to me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> How's the daughter? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mayor Harold$
She left the town to lure those monsters away… She threw herself overthe cliffs. Clara wanted her daughther to be safe... she protected her till the very end.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What?! You mean Rose was their daughter?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mayor Harold$
Rose is the name I gave my granddaughter, I gave it to her wanting her to live a normal and happy life. Seems like fate has already made plans for her...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How about Clara? What happened to her body?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mayor Harold$
Yes, that poor little child is the Prophet. She's not even here now so no one is able to receive the belongings you have brought.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where's her remains located? I shall leave these belongings there.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mayor Harold$
We collected the body under the cliff and buried her in our village cemetery...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Yes, sir. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
